backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing user profiles, exercises, doubts, videos, topics, and notes with CRUD operations, access control via MixinAuthorization, and blob storage via MixinStorage.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining old and new actor state types and a run function that initializes new collections (userProfiles, exercises, doubts, videos) while preserving existing topics, notes, and nextNoteId.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented features including TTS for AI teacher, doubt clarification system, ready-made notes, and Google OAuth authentication with associated files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend files including pages, components, hooks, and utilities covering routing, authentication, notes, doubts, teacher avatar, voice control, and camera integration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes defining colors for background, foreground, primary, secondary, muted, accent, destructive, borders, and sidebar elements.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with viewport meta tag, app title 'Concept Notes Tutor', root div, and module script loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for Dashboard, Doubts, Quiz, Daily Practice, Ready Notes, Notes, and Settings, wrapped in ThemeProvider, LanguageProvider, and ProfileSetupModal.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthButtons: Authentication component with sign in/out button using Internet Identity, handling login states, clearing query cache on logout, and displaying toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/common/OfflineIn: Alert component displaying a warning banner with WifiOff icon when the app detects offline status via useOfflineStorage hook.
frontend/src/components/doubts/DoubtDeta: Displays detailed view of a single doubt entry with question, attached image, solution/explanation, and status badge. Includes a back button to return to the list.
frontend/src/components/doubts/DoubtHist: Shows a searchable list of submitted doubts with status badges and timestamps. Clicking a doubt item triggers a callback to view its details.
frontend/src/components/doubts/DoubtSubm: Form for submitting new doubts with text input, camera capture for images, and voice-to-text support. Handles image preview, camera controls, and submission to backend.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main layout wrapper that includes the app navigation bar, offline indicator, and renders children in a flex container with bottom padding for mobile nav.
frontend/src/components/learning/TopicPo: Displays a list of topic points with selection state and checkmarks. Includes a button to create a note for the current topic.
frontend/src/components/learning/VideoPl: Video player component with play/pause state management and error handling. Uses native HTML5 video element with controls.
frontend/src/components/media/EduIcon.ts: Simple component that renders educational emoji icons (book, pencil, microscope, etc.) based on a string prop.
frontend/src/components/navigation/AppNa: Bottom navigation bar (fixed on mobile, static on desktop) with scrollable buttons for Dashboard, Doubts, Notes, Quiz, Practice, My Notes, and Settings. Highlights active route.
frontend/src/components/notes/CameraCapt: Modal dialog for capturing photos using the device camera. Manages camera lifecycle, displays video preview, and returns captured image file on success.
frontend/src/components/notes/NoteEditor: Note creation and editing form with title, content textarea, camera capture integration, and save/delete actions. Handles image attachment to existing notes.
frontend/src/components/notes/NoteImageP: Displays an attached image from an ExternalBlob in a card with a border and label.
Renders a list of note cards with title, content preview, and badges for topic/image attachments; highlights the selected note.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal dialog for first-time profile setup that collects user name, class level, and subject preferences; shows automatically when authenticated user has no profile.
frontend/src/components/settings/Languag: Dropdown selector for choosing teaching language (English, Hindi, Marathi) stored in global language state.
frontend/src/components/settings/Profile: Card component for editing user profile including name, class level, and subject preferences; saves updates to backend.
frontend/src/components/settings/VoiceCo: Toggle switch for enabling voice control with browser compatibility check; displays supported voice commands (play, pause, next, previous, teacher, notes).
frontend/src/components/teacher/simpleTe: Provides hardcoded teacher explanations in English, Hindi, and Marathi for common learning sections (Introduction, Key Concepts, Examples, Practice Problems, Summary).
frontend/src/components/teacher/TeacherA: Collapsible panel showing AI teacher avatar with text-to-speech explanation of the selected learning point; includes play/pause/stop controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance with authentication; invalidates dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfflineStorage.ts: Custom hook that monitors online/offline status and provides localStorage-based caching functions (save, get, clear) with timestamp tracking for offline data persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for all backend operations including notes CRUD, topics, user profiles, doubts, exercises, and leaderboard data with automatic cache invalidation.
Custom hook wrapping the Web Speech Recognition API to provide voice-to-text transcription with configurable language, continuous mode, and interim results support.
frontend/src/hooks/useTextToSpeech.ts: Custom hook wrapping the Web Speech Synthesis API to provide text-to-speech functionality with configurable voice parameters (rate, pitch, volume) and playback controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useVoiceControl.ts: Implements voice command navigation and learning view controls using speech recognition, with localStorage-based enable/disable toggle and support for commands like 'play', 'next', 'notes'.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a warm coral and teal color theme for both light and dark modes, plus base typography styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, then renders the root App component into the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/DailyPracticePage.tsx: Page component showing a 'coming soon' placeholder for daily practice questions feature, with authentication gate requiring Internet Identity login.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Main dashboard page that displays a welcome screen for unauthenticated users and a grid of navigation cards (Ask Doubts, Study Notes, Quiz, Daily Practice, My Notes, Progress) for authenticated users.
frontend/src/pages/DoubtsPage.tsx: Page for submitting and viewing doubts with tabs for submission form and history list; shows sign-in prompt for unauthenticated users and detail view when a doubt is selected.
frontend/src/pages/NotesPage.tsx: Personal notes management page with a two-column layout: notes list on the left and editor on the right, allowing users to create, view, and edit their notes.
frontend/src/pages/QuizPage.tsx: Placeholder page for quiz functionality showing a 'Coming Soon' card with planned features like taking quizzes, instant feedback, and progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/ReadyNotesPage.tsx: Placeholder page for ready-made study notes showing a 'Coming Soon' card with planned features like browsing by class/subject, highlighting, and downloading.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Settings page containing sections for authentication, profile settings, language selection, voice control settings, and app footer with attribution.
frontend/src/pages/TopicBrowserPage.tsx: Topic browsing page with a banner, search bar, and grid of topic cards that navigate to individual topic detail pages for video learning with AI teacher guidance.
frontend/src/pages/TopicLearningPage.tsx: Main topic learning page component that displays a topic header, video placeholder, topic points list, and teacher avatar panel with voice control integration for navigation.
frontend/src/state/language.tsx: React context provider for managing app language state (English, Hindi, Marathi) with localStorage persistence.
frontend/src/utils/fileToExternalBlob.ts: Utility function that converts a File object to an ExternalBlob by reading its ArrayBuffer and converting to Uint8Array.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, storing, and managing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom colors using OKLCH color space, container settings, border radius variables, animations, and typography/container-queries plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing an educational app (Class 4-12) with AI teacher avatar, doubt resolution via text/voice/camera, smart notes, Google auth, progress tracking, and multilingual support; includes architectural notes and existing feature list.
